Main Configuration Text: Here you select general configurations, be sure to select where lan-play is located before anything.
Network Adapter Text: Here you select your network interface so when lan play is launched you dont have to select it manually</ br>First click the Load Interfaces button and then select the one correspondig to your local IP
Server List Text: Here You can Export your server list to a local file, import a server list from a local file</ br>or download and import the official lan play server list from github.
Are you sure? Text: This will erase your server list and replace it whit the official one, are you sure you want that?
I am okay whit that, replace it!: I am okay whit that, replace it!
